name: Crime Zone
description:
Catch the perps. Protect and serve. It's another day in the Crime Zone. It's another day in the Crime Zone. It's another day in the Crime Zone. It's another day in the Crime Zone.

Originally released August 2011 for Ludum Dare. Made in Adventure Game Studio. As of 2022, works best in compatability mode for Windows XP. Fullscreen can be toggled using winsetup.exe.

CONTROLS:
Left click to move police.
